tutorial.speak:
Open the B1 Checkin app on your tablet. The app will automatically log you in to your church account.
Select the service you want to check people into. You'll see all your available services listed here.
Next, the app will scan for available printers on your network. Make sure your Brother label printer is turned on and connected to the same WiFi network.
When your printer is found, select it from the list. You can tap Test Print to verify the connection, then tap Save and Restart.
After restarting, select your service again. Notice the printer IP address now shows at the top, confirming your printer is connected.
You're now ready to check people in. You can search by phone number by entering the last four digits, or tap the Name tab to search by name.
To search by name, tap the Name tab and enter the person's last name.
Type the last name and tap Search to find matching families.
The app shows all household members and their assigned groups. Tap on a person to expand their check-in options.
Select the service time and group for each person you want to check in, then tap the Check In button.
Check-in complete! The app confirms the family has been checked in and their name tags are now printing. The app returns to the search screen, ready for the next family.
